features: This spectacular Haaram showcases a cascading design, featuring a diamond-encrusted collar that transitions into a floral motif centerpiece. Emeralds and Rubies add vibrant pops of color, complemented by delicate South Sea Pearl drops. The detachable locket mirrors the necklace's intricate detailing. The open filigree work enhances the brilliance of the diamonds and reflects traditional South Indian artistry. The total weight is 153 grams

description: This Haaram is a true masterpiece, combining the grandeur of traditional South Indian design with modern diamond-setting techniques. The detachable locket adds versatility, while the use of high-quality diamonds, emeralds, rubies, and South Sea pearls guarantees lasting value. A statement piece that exudes opulence and sophistication, reflecting the rich cultural heritage of Hyderabad.
